response.overview: Jaded ex-CIA operative John Creasy reluctantly accepts a job as the bodyguard for a 10-year-old girl in Mexico City. They clash at first, but eventually bond, and when she's kidnapped he's consumed by fury and will stop at nothing to save her life.
response.tagline: Creasy's art is death, and he is about to paint his masterpiece.
response.title: Man on Fire

titles.title: Man on Fire - Mann unter Feuer

release_dates.note: Film by the Sea Film Festival

results.name: Man on Fire | #TBT Trailer | 20th Century FOX
